section.95: Accepting Information Given by a Truthful Person

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah:On the day of (the battle of) the Trench, the Prophet (ï·º) called the people (to bring news about the enemy). Az-Zubair responded to his call. He called them again and Az-Zubair responded to his call again; then he called them for the third time and again Az-Zubair responded to his call whereupon the Prophet said, "Every prophet has his Hawairi (helper), and Az-Zubair is my Hawari
